name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior QA Engineer with over 10 years of comprehensive experience in test automation, demonstrating proficiency in **Playwright**, **pytest**, **Selenium**, and various **QA methodologies**. Skilled in creating robust test documentation and executing automated tests to ensure high-quality software delivery. Adept in backend programming with **Python** and frameworks such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask**, along with expertise in **SQL** and **SQLAlchemy** for backend validations. Familiar with CI/CD practices and tools like **Git**, as well as monitoring solutions such as **Datadog**, **New Relic**, and **Splunk**. Proven track record of successfully contributing to critical projects in top-tier organizations, including VISA and Reply Polska.
